author: chenxvan
body:
This PR adds the possibility to produce Pixel Phase 1 maps for Offline shifts

It introduce a new python script to generate the maps, and the needed files (vertices) to have them in TH2Poly format
It also add two more maps - Cluster Noise and Cluster Size to the Strip Maps

Finally it adjust some ranges on the available maps, and fixed some bugs that was existed in the last PR
title: Added scripts to produce Pixel Maps and the Cluster Noise and Size for Strip Maps
